positionDescription: Senior iOS developer working on modular mobile application (iPad) used by 1000s of airline pilots. Designed and implemented 2 big offline-first modules – 3d live map with interactive weather charts, flight routes, waypoints etc. and information database with 20k+ airports. Huge, highly customizable codebase with 70+ subprojects with mixed Swift, Objective-C, C and C++ sources. Team size: ~15 iOS devs, ~10 backend devs, QAs, POs

Senior iOS engineer worked on iPad application for UK based medical practitioners (doctors, nurses). Project was written in Swift using Core Data, advanced backend API, Auto Layout, Jenkins CI, XC UI automation tests etc. Working in Scrum methodology. Helped with recruitment processes.

Internal Jeppesen and Boeing R&D department mainly as iOS developer (10+ projects finished), UI/UX designer (4+ projects finished) and worked as tech lead/research analyst. Employee of the year 2014; Agile environment in most projects; Company-wide administration of Apple programs; iOS mentoring in various company departments; Design work in Sketch app and Adobe Photoshop; Participation in projects scenario and idea creation process, business canvas and business value propositions.; 2 aviation patents; Helped with recruitment processes

Software house for various big polish companies. 3 production applications finished: Interia London 2012 – iOS news coverage of London Olympics sponsored by Panasonic and Interia, work done as iOS developer / team leader; SKOK Insurance – iOS enterprise app for insurance agents, work done as iOS developer / team leader; BuddyWay – iOS travel app with IVONA text-to-speech technology. Administration of Apple accounts. Helping with UX design for some of the iOS apps
